concept.definition: To perform actions otherwise described in New Zealand Legislation
To perform risk management assessment and the disclosure is solely to a person engaged by the agency for the purpose of assessing the agencyâ€™s risk
To perform actions relating to the mandatory reporting of child abuse
To perform actions relating to screening carried out under legislation

Where no purpose of use code was supplied in an API request. This may not be a valid code for clients to supply, but will be used in the audit record to indicate no purpose of use code was included in a rejected request.
